subject: p16848073
History: Evaluation of the patient after esophageal dilatation, to assess for pneumomediastinum.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to pre-operative study from. Heart size is normal. Mediastinum is normal. Lungs are essentially clear except for minimal right basal atelectasis. No evidence of pneumomediastinum or pneumothorax is seen within the limitations of the study technique.
